cpthree: Our philosophy is our greatest motivation: at SCI Hibiscus, we set standards in design, quality and innovation, placing particular emphasis on the development of sustainable and liveable properties. Whether for your own use or as an investment, be inspired by our property portfolio and enjoy the benefits of buying directly from us as the developer: no commission or intermediary fees.
iptwo: Coming soon: Discover our construction projects currently under development in Cameroon's major cities.
ipthree: We continue to build for you: Find our new property projects here, which we are currently planning and preparing for marketing. From modern residences to professional spaces, each project incorporates our expertise in sustainable local materials and bioclimatic design.
refone: We have already designed, built and supported numerous residential, commercial and mixed-use projects.

subtext: Ready to move in: natural flats in Bonapriso

subtext3: Apartment for sale in Douala, Bonapriso
subtext4: Central location, refined design, varied offering
subtext5: Classic contemporary or resolutely urban: to each their own way of living.
subtext6: Bonapriso Kalapro Residence offers a harmonious architectural ensemble, designed to blend naturally into one of Douala's most sought-after neighbourhoods. The project combines controlled modern lines and balanced volumes, offering a strong and timeless identity.
subtext7: Large openings, generous balconies and bright layouts create comfortable, functional and sustainable living spaces. The architecture emphasises air circulation, natural light and the quality of materials, for a living environment that is elegant, dynamic and sustainable.
subtext9: Between tranquillity and city life, Bonapriso Kalapro Residence is located in one of Douala's most sought-after neighbourhoods.
subtext10: The residence is set in a quiet and secure environment, where tranquillity and city life come together. Bonapriso is known for its quality of life, prestige and excellent infrastructure. Close to offices, schools, shops and the city's main thoroughfares, Bonapriso Residence offers the best of both worlds: everyday tranquillity and easy access to business and social centres. An ideal location for those seeking comfort, organisation and sustainability in the heart of Douala.
hear: Our experts are here to listen to you
heartext: Our team is at your disposal to provide you with information and personalised support for your purchase project at Bonapriso Kalapro Residence, from discovering the programme to finalising the sale.
